name: Catto Boi: Trouble in Love Land
name_original: Catto Boi: Trouble in Love Land
description:
This game is not for kids! If you are under 16, do not play this game. People who are easily disturbed or suffer from epilepsy may not have a safe experience playing this game.

*

You find out about Catto Boi one day - as soon as you meet him, you already want to know more!

Throughout several weeks, you go on many dates with Catto Boi to try and find out what makes him tick! You also meet his friends along the way!

Can you win the way to his heart in this stunning new visual novel?

Made, written and directed by the developer behind the Catto Boi series.

*

Note: This visual novel is a joke spinoff, and has no direct correlation to the main Catto Boi series.

(also dw, nothing weird happens lol)

*

Join the community Discord! discord.gg/E6ZuKH9

Terms of Use: https://pastebin.com/ZaGj8wJh

*

Important info, please read:   

This game will not damage anything on your system - it is perfectly safe to run. Please keep this in mind before you play.
